p: Since both dependent variables (attributable depth and damage) are censored on the left at zero, we estimate these with a Tobit regression model (the results are reported in the Article and Supplementary Information). The error term (εi) is assumed to be independently and identically distributed, but there still could be collinearities among parcels within a census tract. We, therefore, cluster the standard errors at the census tract (c) level to account for any unmeasured similarity that these within-tract parcels may have compared to parcels elsewhere in the county.
